name: RAID Status
description: Checks mdadm software RAID arrays for degradation using /proc/mdstat. Marks degraded if any device missing.
check_cmd: if [ -f /proc/mdstat ]; then if grep -q '\[UU\]' /proc/mdstat; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: echo '⚠️ RAID degraded — manual inspection required: run cat /proc/mdstat or mdadm --detail /dev/md*'
verify_cmd: if grep -q '\[UU\]' /proc/mdstat 2>/dev/null; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
